nodes.text: Tun-Badon was a male Sanyassan who lived during the Republic Dark Age. He was a member of the mercenary group Rusher's Brigade and commanded the unit Serraknife Battalion. Rusher's Brigade fought for the Sith Lord Daiman during the Battle of Gazzari, and Tun-Badon and the rest of Serraknife Battalion were killed during the engagement.
